submission: class Solution { public: int numberOfAlternatingGroups(vector<int>& colors, int k) { vector<int> a; for(int ele : colors) a.push_back(ele); for(int i=0;i<k-1;i++) a.push_back(colors[i]); int ans = 0; for(int i=0;i<a.size();i++) { int count = 1; for(int j=i+1;j<a.size();j++) { if(a[j] != a[j - 1]) count++; else { i = j - 1; break; } if(j == a.size() - 1) { i = 3 * a.size(); break; } } ans += max(0, count - k + 1); } return ans; } };
